title: The One with the Princess Leia Fantasy
synopsis: Ross reveals a fantasy to Rachel involving a certain Star Wars character.

title: The One Where No One's Ready
synopsis: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

title: The One with the Jam
synopsis: After breaking up with Richard, Monica uses her free time to make jam and consider insemination via a sperm bank.

title: The One with the Metaphorical Tunnel
synopsis: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll. Phoebe poses as Joey's agent and gets him some good parts.

title: The One with Frank Jr
synopsis: Phoebe's half-brother visits, and they have trouble bonding.

title: The One with the Flashback
synopsis: When Janice asks the gang if any of them have ever slept together, the friends flash back to a time three years earlier.

title: The One with the Race Car Bed
synopsis: Monica buys a new bed from Janice's soon-to-be-ex-husband, but the wrong one is delivered.

title: The One with the Giant Poking Device
synopsis: Joey and Monica catch Janice kissing her ex-husband.

title: The One with the Football
synopsis: The gang plays a game of touch football on Thanksgiving.

title: The One Where Rachel Quits
synopsis: Rachel quits her job after Gunther tells her she needs to be retrained.

title: The One Where Chandler Can't Remember Which Sister
synopsis: A drunken Chandler fools around with one of Joey's sisters -- but he can't remember which one.

title: The One with All the Jealousy
synopsis: Ross becomes jealous when he thinks he catches Rachel's new co-worker flirting with her.

title: The One Where Monica & Richard Are Just Friends
synopsis: Monica's willpower is tested when she runs into Richard at a video store.

title: The One with Phoebe's Ex-Partner
synopsis: Phoebe is reunited with her former singing partner. Rachel's new job is putting a strain on her relationship with Ross.

title: The One Where Ross & Rachel Take a Break
synopsis: Ross seeks solace at a party after a bitter fight with Rachel and ends up in the arms of another woman.

title: The One The Morning After
synopsis: When Rachel discovers that Ross slept with Chloe, she decides to break up with him.

title: The One Without the Ski Trip
synopsis: A lonely Ross visits Carol when Rachel goes on a ski trip with some friends.

title: The One with the Hypnosis Tape
synopsis: Phoebe is distraught when her brother wants to marry a woman twice his age. A hypnosis tape makes Chandler act like a woman.

title: The One with the Tiny T-Shirt
synopsis: Rachel goes on her first date since her breakup with Ross. Monica dates Pete, even though she is still not attracted to him.

title: The One with the Dollhouse
synopsis: Joey thinks he's found his true love. Rachel's boss dates Chandler, creating big trouble for Rachel. Monica inherits a dollhouse.

title: The One with a Chick. And a Duck
synopsis: When Pete buys a restaurant, Monica must decide whether to accept his offer of employment there. Joey and Chandler adopt a duck and a chick.

title: The One with the Screamer
synopsis: Ross thinks that Rachel's date is crazy. Joey falls in love with Kate, but when she's offered a job in Los Angeles, she takes it.

title: The One with Ross's Thing
synopsis: Ross finds a strange growth on his buttocks. Phoebe can't choose between two guys. Monica's boyfriend surprises her by not proposing marriage.

title: The One with the Ultimate Fighting Champion
synopsis: To Monica's horror, Pete plans to be in an ultimate fight. Phoebe sets Ross up on a date with a woman who used to be bald.

title: The One at the Beach
synopsis: The gang goes to the beach. Phoebe meets a family friend with links to her family's past. Ross discovers that Rachel still loves him.
